programme.title: The Independent
programme.desc: During the final weeks of the most consequential presidential election campaign in US history, America is poised to elect either its first female president or finally break the country's two-party gridlock with its first viable independent candidate. An idealistic young journalist gets an opportunity to work with her idol, veteran Washington political columnist Nick Booker. Eli is pursuing a story about budget cuts and by following the money, she and Booker uncover a financial conspiracy that places the fate of the election, the country, and democracy in their hands. Against orders, Admiral Kirk decides to lead the search for Spock and bring him home Leonard Nimoy - Director William Shatner - Admiral James T Kirk DeForest Kelley - Dr Leonard \Bones\ McCoy James Doohan - Scotty George Takei - Sulu Walter Koenig - Chekov Nichelle Nichols - Uhura Christopher Lloyd - Kruge Robin Curtis - Lieutenant Saavik Merritt Butrick - David Marcus James B Sikking - Captain Styles Mark Lenard - Ambassador Sarek Leonard Nimoy - Spock.

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure starring William Shatner and DeForest Kelley. Barely surviving the wrath of Khan, the battle-scarred starship Enterprise limps back to Earth, saved only by the sacrifice of the late Captain Spock. programme.title: Long Story Short
programme.desc: A man named Teddy wakes up the morning after his wedding to discover that every few minutes he is jumping forward to the next year of his life. Trapped in a cycle of time jumps, Teddy is faced with a race against time as his life crumbles around him. With the help of his best friend Sam, Teddy tries to piece together where it all went wrong and, as his life flashes before his eyes, he must learn how to live life in the precious moments to win back the woman he loves. programme.title: Save the Cinema
programme.desc: Drama telling the true story of Liz Evans from Carmarthen, south-west Wales, who started a campaign in the 1990s to save the town's Lyric Cinema. programme.desc: The Paarl Royals go up against the Durban Super Giants in SA20 competition. (26.01).

programme.desc: Despite starring in just one full Premier League season, Swansea's Michu remains one of the club's most iconic signings. Here, the Spaniard looks back on his time in the top flight.

programme.desc: A look at one of the most iconic players to have graced the Premier League. Here, the focus is on global superstar Cristiano Ronaldo, who was prolific during his time at Man Utd.

programme.desc: The best of the action from the Farmers Insurance Open at the Torrey Pines Golf Course. Part of the West Coast Swing, the winner at this event last year was English star Justin Rose.
